articles.title: MLB playoff odds: Trade deadline shakes up 2023 World Series betting - USA TODAY
articles.description: After acquiring former MVP pitcher Justin Verlander, the Houston Astros emerged as the American League favorite to win the 2023 World Series.
articles.content:
To say the aftermath of the Major League Baseball trade deadline altered the betting market around the MLB playoffs would be an understatement.
